--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, German Viscuso <netquake@s...> wrote:
> The demo is great but where can I find the "Champview" tab and the
"fitness
> spread" tab?
> 

Notice there are two windows.  One window (on the right by default, I
believe) has the title, "Delphi NEAT: Fitness Monitor."  That window 
has a series of tabs near the top:

"Cumulative successrate, Fitness Spread, Report, Historgram,
ChampView, ChampCode"

You can click on these tabs during a run to see their respective data
or visualization.

Let me know if you still have problems finding the tab.

ken
